articles.author: Ruchita Sonawane
articles.title: Kotak Bank falls another 3% as Manian exit adds to talent loss - The Economic Times
articles.description: Kotak Bank shares fell as much as 4.4% during Thursday's trading to ₹1,552.4 before recovering partially. On the BSE alone, over 1.05 crore Kotak shares changed hands against a two-week daily average of 5.87 lakh shares.

articles.title: How team player Nyrika Holkar made her way to the top in Godrej Enterprises Group - The Economic Times
articles.description: Nyrika Holkar leads Godrej & Boyce, set for a key role in succession planning. Her expertise in law and sustainable development drives innovation. She navigates the family business with a strategic vision and collaborative approach.
